definition: paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: It points out that the ratio of numbers of line segments between chords and secants is 2 under a same precision.
sentences.chinese: 它指出在同樣精度下弦線段數與割線段數之比是2。

sentences.english: Defines the starting point offset and number of segments.
sentences.chinese: 定義起始點偏移量和段數。

definition: rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
lit. to use the eastern wind (idiom)/fig. to use sb's help
making a deer out to be a horse (idiom); deliberate misrepresentation
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to push oneself forward/to seek fame/to be in the limelight/same as 出鋒頭|出锋头[chu1 feng1 tou5]
lit. to use a dog's tail as a substitute for sable fur (idiom)/fig. a worthless sequel to a masterpiece
